Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1973...
Injured on 5/4/1975 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/31/1976 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/6/1976 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1978, off Anthony Brim (PON)...
Had first career hit on 6/7/1978, off Rhett Orme (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1979, off Richard Emert (PIL)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Troy on 6/6/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1984, hitting .560 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/14/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 8/28/1988...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
